ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That Day some faces will be radiant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Many faces will that day be bright,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Some faces on that Day shall be beaming with happiness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Some faces on that day will be radiant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Many a face will be glittering on that day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Some faces that Day will be bright,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (Many) faces on that day shall be bright,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Some faces on that day shall shine
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: On that day faces will be bright as dawn,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: on that Day some faces will be beaming,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Faces on that Day shall be beaming,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Some faces will be bright on that day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Some faces that Day will be beaming,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Some faces that Day, will be bright (true believers of Islamic Monotheism).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Faces on that Day will be radiant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:38] On that day some faces will be shining, radiant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (On that day faces) the faces of the believers who are true in their faith (will be bright as dawn) will be blooming due to Allah's pleasure with them,
